results.content: Thanks for you hard work on making this course available to us. I just believe that this course should be marked as Beginners instead of all levels. Someone with more experience on Web Development like me will think this course is to weak. Also the title mislead users, I don't think this course shows all the steps to make a professional website but just the start to it. Overall the course was made with good quality of videos and the audio was really easy to understand. Thanks for your help!

results.content: The instructor provided over the shoulder training videos all through the course which made understanding the content easy. I loved this course... well done.
results.content_html: The instructor provided over the shoulder training videos all through the course which made understanding the content easy. I loved this course... well done.

results.content: This was definitely one of the better WordPress courses. More for the beginner, not much for the intermediate. They get you started easily and going in the right direction.
results.content_html: This was definitely one of the better WordPress courses. More for the beginner, not much for the intermediate. They get you started easily and going in the right direction.

results.content: This was easy to follow and understand. The explanations and teaching style were easy to keep up with and the short tests along the way also assist learning. This would be good for someone who hasný played around with worpress much, or has used a more advanced theme and wants to understand how to setup a site with a free theme. It's more beginner, not intermediate.
